name: Solitaire Buddies Card Game
description:
SOLITAIRE BUDDIES FEATURES
- 100% FREE tri-peaks solitaire
- Over 400+ solitaire levels for you to stampede through
- Live, real-time global chat and club chat
- Exciting puzzles and collection items to gift, trade, and collect
- Create your own club or join a pre-existing one and win weekly tournaments for big prizes
- Over 25+ card backs to unlock and call your own

STAMPEDE YOUR WAY TO SOLITAIRE GLORY
Solitaire Buddies has a NEW feature called stampede mode! By building a very long streak, bonus payouts and prizes are added to almost every card in the play area! Stampede mode is unique to our card game – come find out why stampede mode makes our game unlike any other solitaire games out there!

DAILY MISSIONS
With new challenges available every day, there’s always rewards to look forward to, and always a mission to complete.

SADDLE UP WITH YOUR BUDDIES
With our all new clubs feature, there’s always someone to saddle up with and play. So what are you waiting for? Get in the saddle and play Solitaire Buddies today!

GET WILD!
Are you stuck between a 2 and a 4? Our wild card system will help you become sheriff of the wild west in no time. Be sure to keep a healthy stock of these cards handy for when you’re in a bind!

BUILD YOUR STREAK
Build up your streaks to earn exciting in-game power ups to enhance your solitaire experience. With a changing streak each level, there’s always challenging streaks to build up, and always a new challenge available for you to complete.

POCKET CARDS
Refillable pocket cards allow you to keep your streaks alive. Pocket cards can be filled up between every level, so don’t forget to keep a healthy stock!

MORE FREE SOLITAIRE, MORE FUN
With over 400 levels to play, your free solitaire haven is here, and with many power ups, streaks, puzzles, and collection items to be collected, there is always fun to be had!

GET SOCIAL
Have you already become the next tri-peaks sheriff of the wild west? Follow us on Facebook and Twitter for up-to-date news on Solitaire Buddies, for new contests, and for daily rewards!

https://www.facebook.com/solitairebuddiescommunity/
